title: Automated sales follow-up with GPT, Tavily Research and Gmail
description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

üöÄ GPT-5 AI Lead Research & Auto-Email Agent ‚Äì Instant Personalized Follow-Ups for Inbound Leads

Description:
Turn every inbound lead into a booked meeting ‚Äî automatically.

For step-by-step guide on how to build workflows like these, watch the free tutorial videos here:
https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

This n8n workflow uses the latest GPT-5 model as your 24/7 
AI research and email assistant. The moment a prospect submits your lead form, the workflow:
Captures lead details (name, business URL, email, and inquiry).
Researches the lead‚Äôs business online using the Tavily AI search tool for relevant context.
Writes a highly-personalized email with GPT-5, including a compelling subject line, friendly tone, and clear call-to-action to book a meeting.
Sends the email automatically via Gmail ‚Äî no manual work required.
Perfect for startups, agencies, SaaS companies, and B2B sales teams, this template ensures lightning-fast responses and higher conversion rates.

Key Features & Benefits:

üîç AI-powered research ‚Äì pulls real, up-to-date insights on your leads before responding.
‚úç Natural, persuasive copywriting ‚Äì GPT-5 crafts emails that sound human, not robotic.
‚è± Instant follow-ups ‚Äì zero delay from form submission to inbox.
üìà Boost booking rates ‚Äì every email includes your scheduling link (e.g., Calendly).
‚öô No-code automation ‚Äì easily customize tone, style, or meeting link.

Ideal Use Cases:

Automating inbound lead follow-up in marketing agencies.
Personalized outreach for B2B SaaS sales teams.
High-touch response for consultants and service providers.

Included Integrations:

Form Trigger ‚Äì capture lead data.
Tavily Search Tool ‚Äì enrich lead profiles with live research.
GPT-5 Agent ‚Äì craft tailored responses with contextual awareness.

Gmail ‚Äì send professional follow-up emails instantly.
üí° Pro Tip: Pair this with your CRM in n8n to log every lead interaction and track conversions end-to-end.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
